system.description:
Engraved eyes with tiny dragonshards for pupils cover this helmet. The shards are attuned to the Mark of Sentinel. Once per day, the wearer can declare a condition that automatically triggers the activation of one of his Mark of Sentinel powers. The helm can only have one contingency active at a time.

For example, a human with the @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.cuuokKqJ5IgaYdNT]{protection} power of the Mark of Sentinel might set the power to activate if an opponentâ€™s attack against him is successful.

If the wearer removes the helm, the contingency is dismissed.
